_Extremely long range attack that enters Heat

Useful in punish situations and as a counter poke.

column2:

column7: _Mid poke to harass the opponent when upclose
_Very long range high attack that can shift to PHS
_Good button to deal with grounded opponents
_Safe ranged attack to build your Zantetsuken levels

_Learn your stance options for mixing the opponent 
 especially after a blocked b+2~F 
 you can start with just PHS 2 and PHS 4
column12: b+2 ⏵ db+1+2,1 ⏵ updraft 2,2 T! ⏵ df+1,2~F ⏵ PHX 2,1

b+2 for short distance, df+1,4 and db+2,1 for medium distance
